channel.title: Algorithm on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Algorithm on A Hugo website

item.title: Algorithms in SICP using Racket
item.description: ;; Exercise 1.9 #lang sicp (define (inc x) (+ x 1)) (define (dec x) (- x 1)) ;; recursive procedure and recursive process: (define (psum1 a b) (if (= a 0) b (inc (psum1 (dec a) b)))) ;; substitution model for calculating (psum1 4 5): ;; (psum1 4 5) ;; (inc (psum1 3 5)) ;; (inc (inc (psum1 2 5))) ;; (inc (inc (inc (psum1 1 5)))) ;; (inc (inc (inc (inc (psum1 0 5))))) ;; (inc (inc (inc (inc 5)))) ;; (inc (inc (inc 6))) ;; (inc (inc 7)) ;; (inc 8) ;; 9 ;; recursive procedure and iterative process: (define (psum2 a b) (if (= a 0) b (psum2 (dec a) (inc b)))) ;; substitution model for calculating (psum2 4 5): (psum2 4 5) (psum2 3 6) (psum2 2 7) (psum2 1 8) (psum2 0 9) (psum2 3 9) 9
